author: cgreenwood
title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Shock death for beloved character as the Nightingale family face tragedy
text:
Hollyoaks spoilers: Shock death for beloved character as the Nightingale family face tragedy 
One the family will be sensationally killed off in the Channel 4 teen soap Spoiler 13th February 2017, 12:10 pm DEATH is coming to Hollyoaks again with a Nightingale set to be killed off. 
One the family will be sensationally killed off in the Channel 4 teen soap in the coming weeks it has been confirmed in a spoiler video. 4 Nathan Nightingale actor Jared Garfield teased the devastating development 
“Big day today,” Jared Garfield teased in a behind the scenes video. “We’re filming a funeral and it’s an even bigger day because we’ve got Linda Gray who’s come back to make her Hollyoaks return. 
“It’s a Nightingale funeral, because Linda Gray is Nana Nightingale.” 
He added: “I can’t tell you whose funeral it is, obviously, but I’ll give you a clue – it’s one of the kids.” 
That means either Nathan, Ellie (Sophie Porley), Alfie (Richard Linnell) or James (Gregory Finnegan) are set to meet their makers in the upcoming scenes. Not known refer to copyright holder 4 The Nightingale family are going to be devastated by a shock death 
Paparazzi shots from the funeral scenes had two characters missing from the action – Mac himself and James, but could one of them be dead or is the soap pulling a major switcheroo? 
Nathan (Jared Garfield) walked in on Lisa (Rachel Adedeji) and Mac (David Easter) in a compromising position just minutes after he proposed to her. Lime Pictures 4 Nathan will be left devastated about his dad and girlfriend’s affair 
Rachel, who plays Lisa, revealed: “It just all escalates. Before Lisa can say anything or even try to explain herself it ends in a lot of tears and drama and just totally not what Lisa or Mac were expecting.” 
She added: “She does genuinely love Nathan and I think with Mac it’s just that lust feeling and she knows he’ll be there for her when she wants sex.” Lime Pictures Nathan will have just proposed to Lisa before walking in on them RELATED STORIES pop star to soap star Who is Duncan James? Here's what Loui Batley looks like now SAVAGE REMARKS Hollyoaks' Holly Cunningham realises truth about Nick Savage as she overhears him 'disrespecting her' SORDID SECRET EXPOSED? Lisa Loveday threatens to expose her affair with Mac Nightingale on Hollyoaks HOT STUFF Former Hollyoaks star Emma Rigby sheds her clothes for sex scene in gritty movie American Violence 
However with Nathan heartbroken, Cleo McQueen (Nadine Mulkerrin) decided that it was time to admit her feelings to Nathan, and tell him that she loves him. Hollyoaks airs weeknights on Channel 4 at 6.30pm with a first look episode following at 7pm on E4
